resources.string:
How To Play: 
 - Try to guess which Bike will be chosen at random! 
 - Simply type the number of one of the motorcycles below and tap on the "Get Bike!" button. 
 - The app will then randomly grab a motorcycle from the list, if it matches what you wrote in the text view, you are a winner! 
 1 - Ducati Monster 
 2 - Honda CBR 
 3 - Suzuki GXSR 
 4 - Kawasaki Ninja 
 5 - Harley-Davidson V-Rod
